alert.note: Alert for Hancock (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 4:59PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN PERRY AND NORTHERN HANCOCK COUNTIES THROUGH 430 PM CDT... At 359 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tell City, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Tell City, Hawesville, Lewisport, Cannelton, Troy, Petri, Skillman, Derby, Adair and Lilly Dale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for south central Indiana...and central Kentucky.
